constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: The number or name of a specific unit contained within a building or complex, as assigned by that building or complex.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

element.comments: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension

element.definition: Value of extension - may be a resource or one of a constrained set of the data types (see Extensibility in the spec for list).
